title: The Psychological Meaning of Homeopathic Remedies
description: As standard works of Creative Homeopathy, these volumes, based on the analysis and repertorization of relevant cases, assist in the understanding of the current life situation of a patient. This enables the therapist to comprehend and support the patient's path of development.The recognition of the psychological meaning of a remedy, which is derived from the observation of the signature of a substance as well as the symptoms of the remedy picture, summarises the empirical knowledge of the remedy relationships gathered in complex statements, and so establishes the proposed new treatment method.This literature is an important foundation for the training in Creative Homeopathy.
